abstract: Derrick Henry averaged 188.5 yards rushing in the first two games of the playoffs, wearing down the Patriots and the Ravens with his bruising running style.
lead_paragraph: Derrick Henry averaged 188.5 yards rushing in the first two games of the playoffs, wearing down New England’s and Baltimore’s defenses with his bruising running style. Henry did much of his damage against the Patriots in the first half, and simply ran over the Ravens in the second half.
